code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import ElectricButton from"./ElectricButton";import"./EventBox.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventBox=_ref=>{let{eventName,eventImgSrc,eventRole,eventLink}=_ref;const rulesArray2=eventRole.split('\n');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-holder","data-aos":"zoom-in-up",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:eventName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"events-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-front",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"event-img",src:eventImgSrc,alt:"".concat(eventName)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-back",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:rulesArray2.map((rule,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"rules",children:rule},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Register",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/".concat(eventLink),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ElectricButton,{ButtonName:"More info"})})})]})]})})]})});};export default EventBox;
